definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)
formal title of the Japanese prime minister
pinyin: Nei4 ge2 Zong3 li3 Da4 chen2

definition: the Qing dynasty equivalent of the Foreign Office

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 這位新總理主要從年輕人中物色人選組建政府。

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 總理委派外交部長作爲他的代表。

sentences.english: Our Prime Minister is unwearied to work for people.
sentences.chinese: 我們的總理孜孜不倦地爲人民工作。

sentences.english: Yesterday, protesters smashed cars carrying the prime minister and his aides.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，示威者搗破載着總理及其助理的汽車。

sentences.english: The death of the premier was reported in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 總理的逝世已在各報紙上報道。

sentences.english: The Chinese delegation was headed by Vice Premier Wang Qishan.
sentences.chinese: 中國代表團團長是中國副總理王歧山。

sentences.english: Premier's European tour to build trust.
sentences.chinese: 溫總理歐洲之行是爲了建立彼此信任。

sentences.english: Indian and Russian officials say the two prime ministers held wide-ranging discussions.
sentences.chinese: 印度和俄羅斯官員說，兩國總理就議題了磋商。

sentences.english: The prime minister was flying back to Islamabad from Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼總理當時正從拉合爾飛回伊斯蘭堡。

sentences.english: His prime ministership is looking more secure by the day.
sentences.chinese: 現在看來他的總理位子更穩了。

sentences.english: The Premier announces that state-run petroleum company will raise gasoline prices from midnight.
sentences.chinese: 總理宣佈，國營石油公司將從午夜起調漲汽油價格。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao also met with Deputy President Motlanthe yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，溫家寶總理也會見了莫特蘭蒂副總統。

sentences.english: Wu said he was glad to meet Prime Minister Putin again.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，很高興時隔不久再次見到總理先生。

sentences.english: The President designated him for premiership.
On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，溫家寶還會見了馬來西亞前總理馬哈蒂爾。

sentences.english: President Obama and Prime Minister Rudd also discussed climate change, with Mr.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統與陸克文總理還討論了氣候變化問題。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
